root: ^System: A black sedan parked in front of your apartment complex is alarming; its windshield is shattered.
^System: Across the street, a man burns down a convenience store, the fire shooting from his bare hands.
^System: His partner carries two heavy metal safes that were ripped from the walls of the store.
^: ( Wait... what? "Just another day," but this isn't… normal, is it? )
^: ( This shouldn't be happening, the world shouldn't be... )
^System: Your daily mail slips through the door's mail slot.
^: ( Ah, I should probably get that. )
